title: Log in servers dead?
body: Logged out, go to log back in, 3 attempts on every account and it fails. Anyone else?

replies.body: I also keep getting the RADS Error. I came here to check if I was the only one but it seems like scumbag Rito didn't just give me a stupid Debonair Ezreal, they had to crush my gameplay time :c
Its rito servers getting ddosed
Someone's mad about getting Lollipoppy~

IM BUYING YOUR 25$ CARDS AND THIS IS WHAT YOU DO.
Riot. You've let me down this time

Well it sounds like everyone is frantically trying to log in, i got in then re-logged to test and got the same error again, waited another 10 mins and got in again. Its really seeming like the log in servers are getting overloaded and a few people are getting through here and there. Id suggest take a break from the log in attempts etc and try a little later when things settle down, at this rate its unlikely you will get a stable game anyway if u manage to get on
Yeah just wait a couple of hours i guess

Guys, i found out how to fix the problem,
Go on Control panel, network and internet, network and sharing center, change adapter settings, your connection, press properties, internet protocol 4, do preferred DNS server address as 8.8.8.8 and alternative as 8.8.4.4
Worked for me. Thanks mate.

A possible solution : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iaPrTN3u0hc

Worked for me, may not work for you.

1. Right click on your connection icon in the bottom right of your screen.
2. Go to the network centre. 
3. Go to the adapter settings thingie.
4. Search your connection.
5. Right click -> properties.
6. Search Internet protocol version 4.
7. Right click -> properties.
8. Change your DNS servers to 8.8.4.4 (the first one) and 8.8.8.8 (the second one).

This worked for me and also fixed a problem that I sometimes had which said that I couldn't connect to a site because my "DNS-Lookup failed".
